alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 10:25PM EDT until June 26 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... East central Richland County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 1100 PM EDT. * At 1024 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Forest Acres, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Sumter, Forest Acres, Dentsville, Shaw Air Base, Arcadia Lakes, Woodfield, Sesquicentennial State Park, Oakland, Villages at Sandhill, Fort Jackson, Sumter County Airport, Mulberry, Dalzell, Dinkins Mill, Rosewood, Fort Jackson Wildcat Road, Boykin, Fort Jackson McCrady Training Center and Wateree River Correctional Institution. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 72 and 91, and between mile markers 98 and 104. Interstate 77 between mile markers 7 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
